source_flux.description: X-ray flux in the 2–20 keV band (in mCrab).

source_flux_error.description: Error of the X-ray flux in the 2–20 keV band (in mCrab).

source_tscale.description: Detection time scale of the source

source_eband.description: Energy range for the source detection (in keV)

band_flux_low.description: X-ray fluxes of the source and the background in the 2–4 keV energy band, measured in mCrab.

band_flux_med.description: X-ray fluxes of the source and the background in the 4–10 keV energy band, measured in mCrab.

band_flux_high.description: X-ray fluxes of the source and the background in the 10–20 keV energy band, measured in mCrab.
